recipe.title: Saffron Crusted Scallops with Lemon-Garlic Quinoa
recipe.author: Chef Emma

steps.description: Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Rinse the scallops and pat them dry with paper towels.
In a small bowl, mix together saffron threads, lemon zest, garlic, salt, and black pepper.
Coat the scallops with the saffron mixture, making sure they are evenly coated.
Place the scallops on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through.
While the scallops are baking, cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice and olive oil.
Once the quinoa is cooked, fluff it with a fork and stir in the lemon juice mixture.
To serve, place a scoop of quinoa on a plate, top with a scallop, and garnish with lemon wedges.
